fields.summary: Remove decay-scheduler.service-users in the fair call guide
fields.description:
As per guide: 'Service users will always be scheduled into the highest-priority queue and won’t be included in the priority computation of normal user calls.'

However, this functionality was never implemented due to some redundant issue during initial development. So this decay-scheduler.service-users needs to be removed from document.

 

[https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r3.4.1/hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-common/FairCallQueue.html]

Ref: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-10281

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
